channel.title: ccb18Vt tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ccb18Vt.

item.description: Scary thread. "We will rue the day where we have other public health emergencies, and we’re simply unable to act decisively and rapidly.” https://t.co/LhoRYMi3nS
item.source:markdown:
Scary thread.
"We will rue the day where we have other public health emergencies, and we’re simply unable to act decisively and rapidly.” https://t.co/LhoRYMi3nS

item.description: @1Password I don't like programs that update automatically and silently. I like programs that tell me an update is available so I don't have to remember to check for a new version every now and again.
item.source:markdown:
@1Password I don't like programs that update automatically and silently.
I like programs that tell me an update is available so I don't have to remember to check for a new version every now and again.

item.description: @1Password Thanks. I'm surprised 1Password 7 didn't tell me there was a new version....
item.source:markdown: @1Password Thanks. I'm surprised 1Password 7 didn't tell me there was a new version....

item.description: @1Password 7.9.832
item.source:markdown: @1Password 7.9.832

item.description: @cjconnor24 @1Password Is that on non-Windows computers? Doesn't seem to work on my Win10 comp.
item.source:markdown: @cjconnor24 @1Password Is that on non-Windows computers? Doesn't seem to work on my Win10 comp.

item.description: @TomLevenson @Twitter @TwitterSupport "This is AT&T, sir. We don't care."

item.description: "The most dangerous framing of 1/6 is that it was about one man and one day. This severely understates the case. It was a violent attack organized by criminal elites who have been working for the demise of US democracy for over forty years." https://t.co/CXzjMeracu
item.source:markdown: "The most dangerous framing of 1/6 is that it was about one man and one day. This severely understates the case. It was a violent attack organized by criminal elites who have been working for the demise of US democracy for over forty years." https://t.co/CXzjMeracu

item.description:
Read this thread: "The Guarantee Clause: Art. IV, Section IV of the Constitution. Maybe the most important clause in the Constitution no one pays attention to." https://t.co/vok19Mcn9x
Related: "...the anniversary of the day in 1868 that Americans changed the U.S. Constitution for the fourteenth time, giving the federal government power to guarantee that state governments could not pass laws that treated some people worse than others." https://t.co/GnCPYNJaJk
item.source:markdown:
Read this thread:
"The Guarantee Clause: Art. IV, Section IV of the Constitution.
Maybe the most important clause in the Constitution no one pays attention to." https://t.co/vok19Mcn9x
Related:
"...the anniversary of the day in 1868 that Americans changed the U.S. Constitution for the fourteenth time, giving the federal government power to guarantee that state governments could not pass laws that treated some people worse than others."
https://t.co/GnCPYNJaJk
